data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Haixi Mongol and Tibetan, Qinghai, China to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 476,116 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haixi Mongol and Tibetan, Qinghai, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Haixi Mongol and Tibetan to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, please give the 39,084 believers in the county of Haixi Mongol and Tibetan the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Haixi Mongol and Tibetan, Qinghai, China to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kalmyk-Oirat people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kalmyk-Oirat people.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Haixi Mongol and Tibetan, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Haixi Mongol and Tibetan, Qinghai, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.focus_label: Haixi Mongol and Tibetan, Qinghai, China
data.section_summary:
the county of Haixi Mongol and Tibetan, Qinghai, China has a population of 515,200.

We estimate Haixi Mongol and Tibetan has 39,084 people who might know Jesus, 8,323 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 467,793 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 39,084 believers in Haixi Mongol and Tibetan to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 476,116 lost friends and neighbors.

location.name: Haixi Mongol and Tibetan
location.full_name: Haixi Mongol and Tibetan, Qinghai, China
